Name: EC2MountPoint
Documentation: The EC2 MountPoint property is an embedded property of the AWS::EC2::Instance type.

Parameters.Name: Device
Parameters.Documentation: How the device is exposed to the instance (such as /dev/sdh, or xvdh).

Parameters.Name: VolumeId
Parameters.Documentation: The ID of the Amazon EBS volume. The volume and instance must be within the same Availability Zone and the instance must be running.
